extendedInfo.description: Search events, go to specific day quickly, add icon to events, use iRT Calendar!Features:- Multiple calendar support- Event icons- Month/week/day view- Quick goto- Advanced saved search- Quick search All- Time from now- Multiple backup to SD card- Next event widget- and more....Pro Features:- Custom Repeat- Custom Reminder- Float Events- Mark as complete- Highlight events- Event title style- Event title color- Event title background colorAndroid 1.6 and higher*** Expires in 30 days ***If you have installed the trial version,To get full version:1. Backup your database: Menu -> More -> Administer Database -> Backup Database2. Buy iRT Calendar 3. Restore database4. If you want the Pro features like Extra Edits, buy also iRT Calendar Pro Key5. Uninstall this Trial versionIf you have not installed this version:To get full version:1. Buy iRT Calendar 2. If you want the Pro features like Extra Edits, buy also iRT Calendar Pro KeySee www.irtcalendar.com. If you find any issue, before you rate, email us at support@iRTWebSolutions.com or post the issue on our websites's forum. It would be difficult for us know/solve your issue if you don't email us. If you like the app, your good rating is highly appreciated.

reviews.title: Good, but not what I\'m looking for
reviews.comment: The extra edits options for custom repeats attracted me. Unfortunately it doesn\'t provide options that I can\'t find for free. What I can\'t seem to find on any calendar app is a repeat option for when a repeat falls on a non business day. I get Social Security Disability. The payments arrive on the third of the month. But when the third falls on a weekend or holiday, the payment arrives on the preceding business day. The result is I have to manually enter all occurrences. I wish an app did that.
reviews.author: Ric Burger
